hanzi-su-wiki:
視

Значения

Пристально смотреть, вглядываться

Мнемоника

Видеть 見 предков 礻, пристально вглядываясь в зеркало.

Варианты

視, 视
purpleculture_pinyin:
shì
to look at; to regard; to inspect
смотреть на; в отношении; проверить

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 视)
Pictophonetic: 礻 indicates the sound; 見 (see) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 視為 [ shì wéi ]: to view as; to see as; to consider to be; to deem
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 礻 [ shì ] spirit
    • 見 [ jiàn ] to see, to observe, to meet, to appear
heisig_chinese_memo: The beaurocracy in Japan is such that even altars need to be inspection approved. A little man with glasses comes once a year to see the altar and give it a "visual once over" as he calls it (perhaps checking for unauthorised symbology?).
heisig_constituent: inspection, altar, see, telescope, eye, human legs
Keyword_KANJIDIC: inspection, regard as, see, look at
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: осмотр, расценивают как смотрите, посмотрите на
koohiiStory1: The beaurocracy in Japan is such that even altars need to be inspection approved. A little man with glasses comes once a year to give the altar a "visual once over" as he calls it (perhaps checking for unauthorised symbology?).
koohiiStory2: [inspection; regard as; see; look at] Inspection: you 示 show (#1086) and someone else 見 see (#57).
jp_example_words:
監視(かんし): observation, guarding, inspection, surveillance
近視(きんし): shortsightedness
視覚(しかく): sense of sight, vision
視察(しさつ): inspection, observation
視点(してん): opinion, point of view, visual point
視野(しや): field of vision, outlook
重視(じゅうし): importance, stress, serious consideration
無視(むし): disregard, ignore
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: When you see a spirit you have to look at it. Look at it directly, because if you look away then it could disappear.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look at the spirit. Look at its shape and into its eyes. Just don't look away.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You look at the spirit for as long as you can, until you hear a sheep (し) sound. You look away for a second, see the sheep look at you, and when you look back the spirit is gone. Damn!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Now you have to look at this sheep. Maybe the sheep was projecting the spirit... or maybe it's just a sheep. You'll have to look at it a bit longer to know for sure.
Ru_Meaning: inspection, regard as, see, look at
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 示 (しめす、ジ、シ указывать) в форме 礻.
Ru_trainchinese: shì: (глаг) смотреть на; наблюдать, следить; относиться как к, считать за
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if you see (見) what you're shown (礻) then you're seeing
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The government has a lot of control in China.  Even altars have to get seen and inspected.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle from " Head from" " people ", prominent eyes, look at the table depending on the meaning, A bronze inscription " view ", " see " are different, refer to " see ."

Bronze " , as the " Three-shaped, the first deck Oracle, from the " head " from " person "; second "From See " " s " sound; the third from the " head ", " s " sound, and It is said that the ancient writing is close in shape. The first type is the pictograph of vision, and the second and third types are the later pictophonetic characters.

Oracle said that the inspection meant to observe the enemy's situation in order to prepare for battle (Qiu Xigui). Inscriptions on Jin said that He Zun: "𧠟(視)Yu Gongshi" is also used as a person's name and place name.

"Said Wen": "Seeing, looking at it. From seeing to show. 𥄙, ancient text viewing. 眡, also ancient text viewing.
humanum_short_description_en: Oracle from the " head " to the " person ", protruding the eyes, to express the meaning of seeing.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文從「目」從「人」，突出眼睛，以表視看之意，甲金文「視」、「見」有別，參見「見」。

　　金文「視」有三種字形，第一種上承甲骨文，從「目」從「人」；第二種從「見」「氏」聲；第三種從「目」「氏」聲，與說文古文形近。第一種是視的象形初文，第二、三種是後起形聲字。

　　甲骨文表示視察，有爲了準備戰鬥而觀察敵軍情況之意(裘錫圭)。金文表示看，何尊：「𧠟(視)于公氏」，又用作人名、地名。

　　《說文》：「視，瞻也。从見示。𥄙，古文視。眡，亦古文視。」
humanum_short_description: 甲骨文從「目」從「人」，突出眼睛，以表視看之意。

  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 礻 [ shì ] spirit
    • 見 [ jiàn ] to see, to observe, to meet, to appear
①看：視覺。視力。視野。鄙視。注視。近視。視而不見。熟視無睹。
②親臨某事：視事。視察。
③看待：藐視。重視。等閒視之。
④看望：探視。省(xǐng)視。
⑤比照：“天子之卿受地視侯”。
⑥古同“示”，表明。

視字的基本解释

視
shì
见“视”。

視字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shì］
［《廣韻》常利切，去至，禪。］
［《廣韻》承矢切，上旨，禪。］
“眎1”的今字。“视1”的繁体字。
(1)看。
(2)观察；审察。
(3)监视；督察。
(4)探望。
(5)看待；对待。
(6)照顾；照料。
(7)嘱咐；教导。
(8)治理；处理。
(9)比照，比拟。
(10)引申为好比。
(11)比较。
(12)效法。
(13)活；生存。
(14)接纳。
(15)引申为理睬。
(16)周时诸侯使卿以大礼代谒天子。
(17)通“示”。以事或物示人。
(18)通“指”。参见“視撝”。
(19)水名。即涀水。在今河南省叶县西。
(20)姓。晋代有视连。见《晋书》。

視字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【見字部】　視； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1134第21
〔古文〕?眡???眎?【集韻】時利切【韻會】是義切【正韻】時吏切，?音嗜。【說文】瞻也。【博雅】明也。【易·履卦】視履考祥。【書·大甲】視遠惟明。　又【字彙】看待也。【左傳·成三年】鄭賈人如晉，荀罃善視之。　又【博雅】效也。【書·大甲】視乃厥祖。【疏】言當法視其祖而行之。　又【小爾雅】比也。【左傳·襄二十七年】季武子使謂叔孫以公命，曰：視邾滕。【註】欲比小國。【禮·檀弓】公室視豐?。【疏】言視者不正，相當比擬之辭也。　又猶納也。【禮·坊記】君子於有饋者弗能見，則不視其饋。【註】不視，猶不納也。　又猶敎也。【儀禮·鄕射禮】命釋獲者設中，遂視之。【註】視之，當敎之。　又【釋名】視，是也，察是非也。　又【禮·曲禮】兔曰明視。【疏】兔肥，則目開而視明也。又【儀禮·士虞禮】明齊溲酒。【鄭註】明齊，當爲明視，兔腊也。　又【山海經】狄山有視肉。【註】聚肉，形如牛肝，有兩目也。食之無盡，尋復更生如故。　又山水名。【山海經】帝囷山東南五十里曰視山。【又】葴山，視

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shì］
["Guangyun" often sharp, go to, Zen. ]
["Guangyun" inherits the arrow, the decree, and Zen. ]
The present character of "眎1". "视1" in traditional characters.
(1) Look.
(2) Observation; inspection.
(3) Surveillance; inspector.
(4) Visit.
(5) Treat; treat.
(6) Take care; take care of.
(7) Command; teach.
(8) Governance; treatment.
(9) Compare, compare.
(10) The extension is analogous.
(11) Comparison.
(12) Follow the example.
(13) Live; survive.
(14) Acceptance.
(15) The extension is attention.
(16) Zhou Dynasty princes envoys the emperor with great gifts on behalf of the emperor.
(17) Through "show". Show people by things or things.
(18) Same as "refers to". See "seeing".
(19) The name of the water. That is, water. In the west of Yexian County, Henan Province today.
(20) Last name. In the Jin Dynasty, there was a visual company. See "Book of Jin".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youji 1】【See the Department of Words】　视; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: Page 1134 No. 21
[Ancient text]? 眡???眎? [Jiyun] Shiliqie [Yunhui] is Yiqie [zhengyun] When the official cuts, he is addicted to sound. [Said Wen] Zhan Ye. [Bo Ya] Ming Ye. [Easy·Lv Gua] See Lv Kao Xiang. [Book·Dajia] Seeing far and bright.　[Vocabulary] Look at it. [Zuo Zhuan·Three Years] Zheng Jia is like Jin, and Xun Feng treats him well.　[Bo Ya] Effect also. 【Book·Dajia】As the ancestor of Jue Jue. 【Sparse】Speaking as the law depends on its ancestors.　[Xiao Erya] Bi Ye. [Zuo Zhuan·Twenty-seventh Year of Xiang] The envoy of Ji Wuzi said that his uncle and grandson gave his life to the public, and said: See Su Teng. [Note] Want to compare small countries. [Li·Tan Gong] Gongshi Shifeng?. 【Sparse】The person who speaks and sees is not righteous, which is quite analogous.　Yuna again. 【Rite·Fangji】The gentleman can see the person who has the gift, but the gift is ignored. [Note] If you ignore it, you can't accept it.　It's still pretty. 【Ritual·Shooting Ceremony】The person who ordered the release was set in the middle, so he regarded it. [Note] Look at it, and slap it.　 [Release name] See, yes, check right and wrong.　[Li·Qi Li] The rabbit said to see clearly. 【Sparse】The fat of rabbit is open and clear. Also【ritual ceremony·Shiyu ceremony】Ming Qi glutinous rice wine. [Zheng's Note] Ming Qi, when it is clear vision, rabbit La Ye.　[Shan Hai Jing] Di Shan has visual flesh. [Note] Poly meat, shaped like beef liver, has two eyes. Eating endlessly, looking for renewal as before.　The name of the landscape. [Shan Hai Jing] Fifty miles southeast of Dilan Mountain is called Shishan. [Also] Weishan, depending on

Name meaning

shì
вм. 视
Radicals: ネ, 見  (spirit, see)
Meaning Mnemonic
When you see a spirit you have to look at it. Look at it directly, because if you look away then it could disappear.
Look at the spirit. Look at its shape and into its eyes. Just don't look away.
Reading Mnemonic
You look at the spirit for as long as you can, until you hear a sheep (し) sound. You look away for a second, see the sheep look at you, and when you look back the spirit is gone. Damn!
Now you have to look at this sheep. Maybe the sheep was projecting the spirit... or maybe it's just a sheep. You'll have to look at it a bit longer to know for sure.

礼 (этикет), 見 (видеть)
Фонетик: 示 (しめす、ジ、シ указывать) в форме 礻.
